+f39Yg: How to handle duplicates in text.
00F7A+: You have unsaved changes. Save progress and quit?
2xE9Lp: Search only in current tab (Alt + L)
4BVCGT: Translation language for machine translation (e. g. en-US, ru-RU)
6GxmVI: Theme name. Allowed characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, -, _.
79UHR6: Trim: Removes the leading and trailing whitespace from extracted strings. Don't use this option unless you know that trimming the text won't cause any incorrect behavior
IY4spQ: Source text language for machine translation (e. g. en-US, ru-RU)
Kmkc68: Invalid theme name: Allowed characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, -, _.
Qwcfnj: No project selected. Select the project directory, using 'open folder' button in the left-top corner.
RBJbu7: Romanize: If you parsing text from a Japanese game, that contains symbols like 「」, which are just the Japanese quotation marks, it automatically replaces these symbols by their western equivalents (in this case, ').
RLYxg7: Selected directory is already opened in the program.
SBmSJT:
All files were written successfully.
Elapsed:
T8GNTJ: Text was reverted to the previous state
Zsq2dV: Game files do not exist (no original/data/Data directory), so it's only possible to edit and save translation.
eLjwVS: Allow duplicates across maps and events. This may bloat your translation. This mode is always set for system, scripts, and plugins files.
eTuW+e: Cannot determine the type of the game's engine.
hEshvm: Disable Custom Processing: Disables built-in custom processing, implemented for some games. Right now, implemented for the following titles: LISA: The Painful and its derivatives, Fear & Hunger 2: Termina. Will be automatically set if it was used in read
l9/TCp: Default mode does nothing, when the source files are unchanged since the last read - in this case use force append mode.
lU1VVk: Appends any new text from the game to the translation files, if the text is not already present. Unused lines are removed from translation files, and the lines order is sorted.
muCGwP: Select files (You can hold LMB and drag to select multiple files)
mz04g6: Put text to translation textarea of matching source text
ndVNQX: Selected directory does not contain original/data/Data directory, .rgss archive or translation directory. Project won't be initialized.
pGppF2: Selected directory is missing. Project won't be initialized.
rddpax: Remove duplicates across maps and events. Recommended. In system, scripts and plugins files this mode is always overridden by allow mode.
rwxlmD: Language tag is invalid. You must use existing IANA BCP-47 language tag. For example, en-US or ja-JP
uJx4lq: Create .rvpacker-ignore file from purged lines to prevent their further appearance
uY91/9: Do you really want to delete this row? This action is irreversible!
x8vGVE: Translation languages are not set. Input them to the fields above.
